can_do_statement: I can talk about my living arrangements.

lessons.title: Types of Housing
lessons.objective: Identify different types of housing and say where you live.

cards.example_sentence: Vivo en la casa con mi familia.
cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Ella vive en un apartamento pequeño.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Muchos estudiantes viven en la residencia estudiantil.
cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.
Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Necesito encontrar una vivienda cerca del trabajo.
cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.
Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.
Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Quiero compartir un piso con mis amigos.
cards.grammar_explanation: Regular -ir verb.

lessons.title: Rooms of the House
lessons.objective: Name different rooms in a house or apartment.

cards.example_sentence: Mi dormitorio es pequeño pero cómodo.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Me gusta cocinar en la cocina.
cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: El baño está cerca del dormitorio.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Vemos la televisión en la sala.
cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.
Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Me gusta leer en el balcón.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.
Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Guardamos el coche en el garaje.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: El pasillo conecta todas las habitaciones.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

lessons.title: Furniture and Appliances
lessons.objective: Identify common furniture and appliances found in a home.

cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.
Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.
Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.
Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.
Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article. Also known as 'el refrigerador'.
Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.
Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.
Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Guardo mi ropa en el armario.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

cards.example_sentence: Lavo la ropa en la lavadora.
cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. 'La' is the definite article.

lessons.title: Describing Your Home
lessons.objective: Use adjectives to describe your living arrangements.

cards.grammar_explanation: Adjective. Can be used before or after the noun, but placement after is more common. Agrees in number and gender when placed before a noun.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.

lessons.title: Location and Neighborhood
lessons.objective: Describe the location of your home and neighborhood.

cards.example_sentence: Mi casa está cerca de la escuela.
cards.grammar_explanation: Prepositional phrase.

cards.example_sentence: El supermercado está lejos de mi casa.
cards.grammar_explanation: Prepositional phrase.

cards.example_sentence: Vivo en el centro de la ciudad.
cards.grammar_explanation: Prepositional phrase.

cards.example_sentence: Mis padres viven en las afueras.
cards.grammar_explanation: Prepositional phrase.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.

Adjective. Agrees in gender and number with the noun it modifies.
Masculine noun. 'El' is the definite article.

lessons.title: Who Do You Live With?
lessons.objective: Talk about who you live with.

cards.grammar_explanation: Verb conjugation and adjective agreement.
Verb conjugation and preposition.
Noun phrase, possessive adjective.

cards.example_sentence: Vivo con mis compañeros de piso.
cards.grammar_explanation: Noun phrase, plural, possessive adjective.
Plural noun, possessive adjective.
Singular noun, possessive adjective.
Singular noun, possessive adjective.

cards.example_sentence: Vivo solo, no vivo con nadie.
cards.grammar_explanation: Pronoun.
Regular -ar verb.
